original_title: Red Hot Chili Peppers: Live at Slane Castle
overview: On tour promoting their 2002 studio album 'By the Way', Los Angeles-based funk rock band Red Hot Chili Peppers performs a sold-out live show to 80,000 people at Slane Castle in County Meath, Ireland on August 23, 2003.
title: Red Hot Chili Peppers: Live at Slane Castle
